extension.description: An unofficial KissAnime client for Kodi, designed for the Fire Stick, Fire TV, and Windows.

extension.news: v1.2.2.3 (2017-03-22) - Fixed benign Beautiful Soup "html.parser" error - The decryption key is now dynamically generated, based on hard-coded information - Added default video option if unable to decrypt the video links from the quality options - Updated addon.xml for Krypton - Updated license snippets to conform to multi-file program standards - The content type is now properly set - Added screenshots - Updated README with ToC and reference to TMDB API keys - Added context menu options to queue episodes and movies as well as to show the queue - Fixed openload error when preset quality is set to a quality value - Miscellaneous code clean up - Fixed BeautifulSoup bad tag error in v16 - Fixed bug where context menu items are not added correctly to movies, causing a crash - Fixed bug where autoplayer would crash if the preset quality was below the lowest quality
